<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107964</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107964</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202681</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Baseball Fun: Percentages, Decimals, and Fractions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Baseball-Spaß: Prozentsätze, 
Dezimalstriche und Brüche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Amusement de Base-ball : Pourcentages, 
décimales, et fractions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Divertimento Do Baseball: Porcentagens, 
decimais, e frações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Divertimento Di Baseball: Percentuali, 
decimali e frazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διασκέδαση μπέιζ-μπώλ: Ποσοστά, δεκαδικά, και 
μέρη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diversión Del Béisbol: Porcentajes, 
decimales, y fracciones</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will learn the concepts behind fractions, decimals, and percents by using sports statistics found on baseball cards.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erlernen die Konzepte hinter 
Brüchen, Dezimalstrichen und Prozenten, indem sie die 
Sportstatistiken verwenden, die auf Baseballkarten gefunden werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants apprendront les concepts derrière 
des fractions, des décimales, et des pour cent en utilisant des 
statistiques de sports trouvées sur des cartes de base-ball.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes aprenderão os conceitos atrás das 
frações, dos decimais, e dos por cento usando os statistics dos 
esportes encontrados em cartões de baseball.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi impareranno i concetti dietro le 
frazioni, i decimali ed i percento usando le statistiche di sport 
trovate sulle schedi di baseball.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα μάθουν τις έννοιες πίσω από τα 
μέρη, δεκαδικά, και percents με τη χρησιμοποίηση των αθλητικών 
στατιστικών που βρίσκονται στις κάρτες μπέιζ-μπώλ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes aprenderán los conceptos detrás 
de fracciones, de decimales, y de por ciento usando la estadística de
los deportes encontrada en tarjetas de béisbol.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107964</entry>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
